title: Enhance weather warnings/advice with emoji and clearer actions

requirements.text: Update the weather advice generation so that warning/advice copy explicitly includes actionable messages such as “wear warm clothes”, “stay hydrated”, and “carry an umbrella”, and include relevant emojis in the user-facing advice text.

quotes: Add warnings like wear warm clothes stay hydrated carry an umbrella etc use emoji also

acceptanceCriteria: When the app detects rainy/drizzly conditions, the advice includes an umbrella-related message and contains at least one umbrella/rain emoji in the displayed title and/or message.

When the app detects cold conditions, the advice includes an explicit “wear warm clothes/dress warmly” style message and contains at least one cold/warm-clothes emoji in the displayed title and/or message.
When the app detects hot conditions, the advice includes an explicit “stay hydrated” style message and contains at least one heat/hydration emoji in the displayed title and/or message.
Advice with emojis is visible in the existing AdviceBanner UI (no emojis-only; keep readable English text).

requirements.text: Ensure the AdviceBanner component continues to render the advice title and message as provided (including emojis) without layout regressions (wrapping/truncation) in both light and dark mode.
acceptanceCriteria: AdviceBanner shows emoji characters correctly (not replaced by missing glyph boxes) in modern browsers.
Longer advice messages that include emojis wrap cleanly and remain fully readable on mobile widths.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui components are read-only).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding a 7-day forecast or additional forecast UI.
Adding push notifications, real-time alerts, or external messaging integrations.
